description: This Java source file defines a class 'MockThermostat' which extends 'MockZigbeeDevice' and implements 'BatteryPowered' interface. The class simulates a mock thermostat device with various clusters and capabilities, including setting and getting temperature setpoints, system mode, fan mode, and battery status. It is used for testing or simulation purposes within a Zigbee device environment.

classes.name: MockThermostat
classes.description: A mock implementation of a Zigbee thermostat device used for testing or simulation. It manages multiple clusters including thermostat control, fan, and other Zigbee device functionalities, and supports battery status monitoring.

methods.name: MockThermostat
methods.description: Constructor initializing the mock thermostat with optional EUI64 and endpoint ID, setting up clusters and endpoint information.

methods.name: isLowBattery
methods.description: Checks if the device's battery level is low by querying the BatteryPowered cluster.

methods.name: setLowBattery
methods.description: Sets the low battery status in the BatteryPowered cluster.

methods.name: setBatteryVoltage
methods.description: Updates the battery voltage in the BatteryPowered cluster.

methods.name: getBatteryVoltage
methods.description: Retrieves the current battery voltage from the BatteryPowered cluster.

methods.name: setHeatSetpoint
methods.description: Sets the desired heat temperature setpoint in the thermostat cluster.

methods.name: getHeatSetpoint
methods.description: Gets the current heat temperature setpoint.

methods.name: setCoolSetpoint
methods.description: Sets the desired cool temperature setpoint.

methods.name: getCoolSetpoint
methods.description: Gets the current cool temperature setpoint.

methods.name: setSystemMode
methods.description: Sets the thermostat's system mode (e.g., heat, cool, auto).

methods.name: setHoldOn
methods.description: Sets whether the thermostat is in hold mode.

methods.name: getHoldOn
methods.description: Checks if hold mode is active.

methods.name: setFanMode
methods.description: Sets the fan mode (e.g., auto, on).
